translations: 油滑的，有光泽的（sleek 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: It is the sleekest and most well-put together I have ever looked, " she laughed."
sentences.translation: 这是我见过的最有光泽最好的头发了。” 她笑着说道。

sentences.sentence: Givin are well known throughout the Galaxy as superb shipbuilders, creating some of the sleekest craft in use.
sentences.translation: 吉文人是全银河系最富盛名的造船专家，建造了一些时下最时髦漂亮的飞船。

sentences.sentence: Here are 50 examples of great chair design, from the sleekest you'll ever see, to the funkiest and the just plain weird.
sentences.translation: 这里是50个很棒的椅子设计范例，有我们所见最有光泽的，有最时髦的，还有些让人不可思议的。
